!Valakas Watchman Klein: Not just anyone can wield a dragon's weapon. First, you have to be brave enough to kill a dragon, and event then you will need tremendous wealth. Then, you'll need Dragon Blood to use its skills. But it offers great power, so I can understand why people are compelled to try.
